angry: When angry count to ten before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred.
disgust: Sameness is the mother of disgust, variety the cure.
fear: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.
happy: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
neutral: When you are balanced and when you listen and attend to the needs of your body, mind, and spirit, your natural beauty comes out.
sad: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
surprise: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us.
